title: Great Smoky Mountains National Park: Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Science & Research     Research              Research        Scientists searching for hellbender salamanders in Noland Creek/NPS photo    Â    Permit for Scientific Research  If you wish to conduct scientific research in the park, please visit the National Park Service's Research Permit and Reporting website for information regarding permits. Great Smoky Mountains National Park has a number of issues and research questions that it seeks scientific help answering. If you have specific questions pertaining to research projects in the Smokies, please e-mail or call (828) 926-6251. View a list of active permits as of May 18, 2016.
